ygData.subject: RE: Possible song ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: Now that s a good song!!  Forwarding it to GZ now :) Desmei Sightblinder Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
ygData.messageBody:
Now that's a good song!! Forwarding it to GZ now :)

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 4:30 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Possible song ideas
>
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> How about a change for Alenia's Disenchanting Melody.
>
> Alenia's Disenchanting Melody
> Causes all other players (non- group) in the
> area to become
> disenchanted with the current hunting location and be gated
> to their bind
> points. Causes all other MOB's in the area to become
> disenchanted with
> their fellow MOB's and begin to attack the closest target.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 4:26 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Possible song ideas
> Importance: Low
>
>
> From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>
>
> Here are a few ideas for some new songs. Some of these I've blatantly
> ripped off from others (wish I could give credit, but I can't
> remember the
> names. You know who you are).
>
> * A song that drains all the bards mana (requires full mana?)
> and teleports
> the entire group to a random bard guild. Basically a bard "evac"
>
> * A party CHA increasing song. This would have some interesting uses.
>
> * Chords of Chaos : Radius effect that would randomly alter non-party
> "hate-lists" and targets. Some MOBs might frenzy on the bard
> (or any other
> random party member), some MOBs might attack other MOBs, some
> MOBs might
> flee, etc, etc.
>
> Just some ideas... anyone else?
>
> Desmei Sightblinder
> Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> toren@... with
> the subject lol.
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor
> ----------------------------
>
> Was the salesman clueless? Productopia has the answers.
> <a href=" http://clickme.onelist.com/ad/Productopia1 ">Click Here</a>
>
> --------------------------------------------------------------
> ----------
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> toren@... with the subject lol.
>
